name: AlpsKnowledgeBrokerMPI
brief:
MPI-based parallel implementation of ALPS knowledge broker

AlpsKnowledgeBrokerMPI provides scalable parallel tree search using MPI.
Implements hierarchical Master-Hub-Worker architecture.

**Process hierarchy:**
- Master (rank 0): Inter-cluster load balancing, termination detection
- Hubs: Manage worker clusters, intra-cluster load balancing
- Workers: Process subtrees, report status to hub

**Core methods per process type:**
- masterMain(): Balance hubs, check termination
- hubMain(): Balance workers, report to master
- workerMain(): Explore subtrees, request work

**Load balancing:**
- Inter-cluster: Master moves work between hubs
- Intra-cluster: Hub moves work between workers
- Work donation: Split subtrees when requested

**Static initialization schemes:**
- Root initialization: Master generates nodes, distributes
- Spiral: Distribute initial work in spiral pattern

**MPI communicators:**
- MPI_COMM_WORLD: All processes
- clusterComm_: Hub and its workers
- hubComm_: Master and all hubs
